desc: A mysterious relic used to transcend the Unit Mercenary Mage Elaina
lore: A mysterious green relic retrieved from a defeated commander of the God Army during the fall of the Elysian Kingdom. Similar relics can be found in the possession of other commanders belonging to the different troops of the God Army involved in the fall of the Elysian Kingdom. These relics of unknown purpose hold enormous amounts of divine energy. How the energy may be harnessed remains even a bigger mystery.  This particular relic however, possesses far greater power than the other relics.
name: Verdant Relic
